distribution_pattern: Distributed to firm's retail store locations in WA
product_description: Dilettante Mocha Cafe brand Rheingold White Bulk Toffee, perishable, sold individual pieces out of retail display cases.  The display placard declares milk, pecans and hazelnuts in the first Contains statement, and the 2nd Contains statement declares "Contains: Dairy, Nuts".   Bulk truffle boxes sent to retail stores contains correct label: "***Dilettante Mocha Cafe Rheingold White Bulk Toffee*** UPC 10083 15054***Contains: Milk, Almond, Pecan***Dilettante Mocha Cafe, Tukwila, WA 98188, dilettantemochacafe.com"  The updated display placard provided to retail stores identify milk, almond, and pecan in the ingredients statement and declares almond, milk, and pecan in the contain statement.
reason_for_recall: The firm's retail placard posted on display case declares milk, pecans, and hazelnuts in the Contains statement, but the placard also declares "Contains Dairy, Nuts" only.  There is no ingredient statement.
code_info: Manufactured 6/8/2023 and bulk case includes best by date 11/08/23.
